New Records: Switzerland's 3-1 win over Hungary in Group A of Euro 2024
Kwadwo Duah scored his first goal for Switzerland
Michel Aebischer scored a goal for Switzerland
Key Match Events: Hungary's Barnabas Varga scored a goal with a diving header
Breel Embolo scored the winning goal in extra time
The match almost went to a penalty shootout
Pre-Game Insights: Hungary was criticized for being too passive in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Switzerland coach Murat Yakin praised Breel Embolo's importance to the team
Hungary coach Marco Rossi criticized his team's performance and a tactical misunderstanding
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans of both teams showed strong support during the match
